title: Tutankhamun: Allies & Enemies
overview: This film marks the 100th anniversary of the discovery of King Tutankhamun's tomb. It is a journey of exploration for Egyptian co-hosts Yasmin El Shazly and Mahmoud Rashad into the mysteries and unanswered questions about the boy king's life, his infamous father's religious and cultural revolution, those advising him as he takes the throne at a very young age in one of the most tumultuous periods of Egyptian history, and the circumstances around his untimely death.
